db:abstract.db:para: ConeGeometry allows creation of a cone in 3D space.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The ConeGeometry type is most commonly used internally by the ConeMesh type but can also be used in custom GeometryRenderer types. The ConeGeometry type allows for creation of both a cone and a truncated cone.

db:section.db:title: bottomRadius : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the bottom radius of the cone.

db:section.db:title: hasBottomEndcap : bool
db:section.db:para: Determines if the cone bottom is capped or open.

db:section.db:title: hasTopEndcap : bool
db:section.db:para: Determines if the cone top is capped or open.

db:section.db:title: length : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the length of the cone.

db:section.db:title: rings : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the number of rings in the geometry.

db:section.db:title: slices : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the number of slices in the geometry.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] texCoordAttribute : Attribute
db:section.db:para: Holds the geometry texture coordinate attribute.

db:section.db:title: topRadius : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the top radius of the cone.
